name: Optical Drive
description: An optical drive is an internal or external computer disk drive that uses laser beam technology to read and write data.

name: Display
description: Laptop monitors are all liquid-crystal displays (LCDs) and have two kinds of light sources â€“ LED or CCFL.

name: Camera
description: A video camera that faces the user. Webcams are built into laptops but are separate units that attach to the monitor of a desktop computer.

name: Battery
description: A battery is a hardware component that supplies power to a device, enabling that device to work without a power cord.

name: Speaker
description: A computer speaker is an output hardware device that connects to a computer to generate sound.

name: Touchpad
description: A touch pad is a device for pointing (controlling input positioning) on a computer display screen.
